des:
Have you tried to DIY your own "voice controlled" smart home? Now you can make it your self with Alexa. With a simple voice command, you can control your device on or off and more.
How to realize that? You just nett to buy smart devices, which are supported by "Smart Plus" app, including Lights, switches, socket, curtain, humidifierand so on. 

Here's a setup guide 
1. Download "Smart Plus" app on Google Play or iOS App Store. 
2. Connect your smart device with "Smart Plus" app, and give your device a nick name like "my light". 
3. Search and enable the "Smart Plus" Skill in "Alexa" app, with your username and password of "Smart Plus" app. 
4. Say "Alexa, discover devices", to let Alexa find all your smart devices. 
5. Till now, setup is done. You can start your smart home experience now! You can try:

"Alexa, turn on/off my light"
"Alexa, brighten/dim my light"
"Alexa, set my light to warm white"
